data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monniot, Françoise, Dettai, Agnès (2015): Pedunculate Molgula species (Ascidiidae, Molgulidae) from the French Antarctic sector. Redescription and taxonomic revision. Zootaxa 3920 (1): 171-197, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3920.1.9
